attributes.action: We want a petition because they are making an unnecessary KFC in Hulme
attributes.additional_details: There are over 20 fast food restaraunts in the small area of Hulme and we are shortening the lives of the future generation by saturating the area with them.
attributes.background: In the UN children's convention children have the right to healthy nutritious food and building unnecessary fast food restaurant violates that you are not giving them the option if its shoved in there face.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Planning is the responsibility of your local council. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You can also petition your local council - you can find out more here: 

http://petitions.manchester.gov.uk/consult.ti/system/text/aboutpetitions
